com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.connection

Class OAConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.connection.OAConnection

  • public class OAConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to wrap functionality around a java.sql.Connection to offer Statement and PreparedStatement Pooling. Mostly used internally by ConnectionPool.

    • Field Summary
